snippet: The investigation into alleged sexual abuse of minors casts a new shadow upon a powerful but troubled worldwide religious order, whose late founder became enmeshed in a similar sex scandal years ago.
abstract: Vatican is investigating seven priests from the Legionaries of Christs for alleged sexual abuse of minors; investigation casts new shadow on order already struggling to move beyond revelations that its charismatic founder Rev Marcial Maciel Degollado fathered several children and molested under-age seminarians.

byline.contributor: Karla Zabludovsky contributed reporting from Mexico City.

lead_paragraph: The investigation into alleged sexual abuse of minors casts a new shadow upon a powerful but troubled worldwide religious order, whose late founder became enmeshed in a similar sex scandal years ago.
